sqlite3ext.h

00001 /*
00002 ** 2006 June 7
00003 **
00004 ** The author disclaims copyright to this source code.  In place of
00005 ** a legal notice, here is a blessing:
00006 **
00007 **    May you do good and not evil.
00008 **    May you find forgiveness for yourself and forgive others.
00009 **    May you share freely, never taking more than you give.
00010 **
00011 *************************************************************************
00012 ** This header file defines the SQLite interface for use by
00013 ** shared libraries that want to be imported as extensions into
00014 ** an SQLite instance.  Shared libraries that intend to be loaded
00015 ** as extensions by SQLite should #include this file instead of 
00016 ** sqlite3.h.
00017 **
00018 ** @(#) $Id: sqlite3ext.h,v 1.25 2008/10/12 00:27:54 shane Exp $
00019 */
00020 #ifndef _SQLITE3EXT_H_
00021 #define _SQLITE3EXT_H_
00022 #include "sqlite3.h"
00023 
00024 typedef struct sqlite3_api_routines sqlite3_api_routines;
00025 
00026 /*
00027 ** The following structure holds pointers to all of the SQLite API
00028 ** routines.
00029 **
00030 ** WARNING:  In order to maintain backwards compatibility, add new
00031 ** interfaces to the end of this structure only.  If you insert new
00032 ** interfaces in the middle of this structure, then older different
00033 ** versions of SQLite will not be able to load each others' shared
00034 ** libraries!
00035 */
00036 struct sqlite3_api_routines {
00037   void * (*aggregate_context)(sqlite3_context*,int nBytes);
00038   int  (*aggregate_count)(sqlite3_context*);
00039   int  (*bind_blob)(sqlite3_stmt*,int,const void*,int n,void(*)(void*));
00040   int  (*bind_double)(sqlite3_stmt*,int,double);
00041   int  (*bind_int)(sqlite3_stmt*,int,int);
00042   int  (*bind_int64)(sqlite3_stmt*,int,sqlite_int64);
00043   int  (*bind_null)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00044   int  (*bind_parameter_count)(sqlite3_stmt*);
00045   int  (*bind_parameter_index)(sqlite3_stmt*,const char*zName);
00046   const char * (*bind_parameter_name)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00047   int  (*bind_text)(sqlite3_stmt*,int,const char*,int n,void(*)(void*));
00048   int  (*bind_text16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int,const void*,int,void(*)(void*));
00049   int  (*bind_value)(sqlite3_stmt*,int,const sqlite3_value*);
00050   int  (*busy_handler)(sqlite3*,int(*)(void*,int),void*);
00051   int  (*busy_timeout)(sqlite3*,int ms);
00052   int  (*changes)(sqlite3*);
00053   int  (*close)(sqlite3*);
00054   int  (*collation_needed)(sqlite3*,void*,void(*)(void*,sqlite3*,int eTextRep,const char*));
00055   int  (*collation_needed16)(sqlite3*,void*,void(*)(void*,sqlite3*,int eTextRep,const void*));
00056   const void * (*column_blob)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00057   int  (*column_bytes)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00058   int  (*column_bytes16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00059   int  (*column_count)(sqlite3_stmt*pStmt);
00060   const char * (*column_database_name)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00061   const void * (*column_database_name16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00062   const char * (*column_decltype)(sqlite3_stmt*,int i);
00063   const void * (*column_decltype16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00064   double  (*column_double)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00065   int  (*column_int)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00066   sqlite_int64  (*column_int64)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00067   const char * (*column_name)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00068   const void * (*column_name16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00069   const char * (*column_origin_name)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00070   const void * (*column_origin_name16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00071   const char * (*column_table_name)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00072   const void * (*column_table_name16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00073   const unsigned char * (*column_text)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00074   const void * (*column_text16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00075   int  (*column_type)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00076   sqlite3_value* (*column_value)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00077   void * (*commit_hook)(sqlite3*,int(*)(void*),void*);
00078   int  (*complete)(const char*sql);
00079   int  (*complete16)(const void*sql);
00080   int  (*create_collation)(sqlite3*,const char*,int,void*,int(*)(void*,int,const void*,int,const void*));
00081   int  (*create_collation16)(sqlite3*,const void*,int,void*,int(*)(void*,int,const void*,int,const void*));
00082   int  (*create_function)(sqlite3*,const char*,int,int,void*,void (*xFunc)(sqlite3_context*,int,sqlite3_value**),void (*xStep)(sqlite3_context*,int,sqlite3_value**),void (*xFinal)(sqlite3_context*));
00083   int  (*create_function16)(sqlite3*,const void*,int,int,void*,void (*xFunc)(sqlite3_context*,int,sqlite3_value**),void (*xStep)(sqlite3_context*,int,sqlite3_value**),void (*xFinal)(sqlite3_context*));
00084   int (*create_module)(sqlite3*,const char*,const sqlite3_module*,void*);
00085   int  (*data_count)(sqlite3_stmt*pStmt);
00086   sqlite3 * (*db_handle)(sqlite3_stmt*);
00087   int (*declare_vtab)(sqlite3*,const char*);
00088   int  (*enable_shared_cache)(int);
00089   int  (*errcode)(sqlite3*db);
00090   const char * (*errmsg)(sqlite3*);
00091   const void * (*errmsg16)(sqlite3*);
00092   int  (*exec)(sqlite3*,const char*,sqlite3_callback,void*,char**);
00093   int  (*expired)(sqlite3_stmt*);
00094   int  (*finalize)(sqlite3_stmt*pStmt);
00095   void  (*free)(void*);
00096   void  (*free_table)(char**result);
00097   int  (*get_autocommit)(sqlite3*);
00098   void * (*get_auxdata)(sqlite3_context*,int);
00099   int  (*get_table)(sqlite3*,const char*,char***,int*,int*,char**);
00100   int  (*global_recover)(void);
00101   void  (*interruptx)(sqlite3*);
00102   sqlite_int64  (*last_insert_rowid)(sqlite3*);
00103   const char * (*libversion)(void);
00104   int  (*libversion_number)(void);
00105   void *(*malloc)(int);
00106   char * (*mprintf)(const char*,...);
00107   int  (*open)(const char*,sqlite3**);
00108   int  (*open16)(const void*,sqlite3**);
00109   int  (*prepare)(sqlite3*,const char*,int,sqlite3_stmt**,const char**);
00110   int  (*prepare16)(sqlite3*,const void*,int,sqlite3_stmt**,const void**);
00111   void * (*profile)(sqlite3*,void(*)(void*,const char*,sqlite_uint64),void*);
00112   void  (*progress_handler)(sqlite3*,int,int(*)(void*),void*);
00113   void *(*realloc)(void*,int);
00114   int  (*reset)(sqlite3_stmt*pStmt);
00115   void  (*result_blob)(sqlite3_context*,const void*,int,void(*)(void*));
00116   void  (*result_double)(sqlite3_context*,double);
00117   void  (*result_error)(sqlite3_context*,const char*,int);
00118   void  (*result_error16)(sqlite3_context*,const void*,int);
00119   void  (*result_int)(sqlite3_context*,int);
00120   void  (*result_int64)(sqlite3_context*,sqlite_int64);

00123   void  (*result_text16)(sqlite3_context*,const void*,int,void(*)(void*));

00138   void * (*user_data)(sqlite3_context*);
00139   const void * (*value_blob)(sqlite3_value*);
00140   int  (*value_bytes)(sqlite3_value*);
00141   int  (*value_bytes16)(sqlite3_value*);

00155   int (*prepare_v2)(sqlite3*,const char*,int,sqlite3_stmt**,const char**);
00156   int (*prepare16_v2)(sqlite3*,const void*,int,sqlite3_stmt**,const void**);

00198 /*
00199 ** The following macros redefine the API routines so that they are
00200 ** redirected throught the global sqlite3_api structure.
00201 **
00202 ** This header file is also used by the loadext.c source file
00203 ** (part of the main SQLite library - not an extension) so that
00204 ** it can get access to the sqlite3_api_routines structure
00205 ** definition.  But the main library does not want to redefine
00206 ** the API.  So the redefinition macros are only valid if the
00207 ** SQLITE_CORE macros is undefined.
00208 */
00209 #ifndef SQLITE_CORE
00210 #define sqlite3_aggregate_context      sqlite3_api->aggregate_context
00211 #ifndef SQLITE_OMIT_DEPRECATED
00212 #define sqlite3_aggregate_count        sqlite3_api->aggregate_count
00213 #endif
00214 #define sqlite3_bind_blob              sqlite3_api->bind_blob
00215 #define sqlite3_bind_double            sqlite3_api->bind_double
00216 #define sqlite3_bind_int               sqlite3_api->bind_int
00217 #define sqlite3_bind_int64             sqlite3_api->bind_int64
00218 #define sqlite3_bind_null              sqlite3_api->bind_null
00219 #define sqlite3_bind_parameter_count   sqlite3_api->bind_parameter_count
00220 #define sqlite3_bind_parameter_index   sqlite3_api->bind_parameter_index
00221 #define sqlite3_bind_parameter_name    sqlite3_api->bind_parameter_name
00222 #define sqlite3_bind_text              sqlite3_api->bind_text
00223 #define sqlite3_bind_text16            sqlite3_api->bind_text16
00224 #define sqlite3_bind_value             sqlite3_api->bind_value
00225 #define sqlite3_busy_handler           sqlite3_api->busy_handler
00226 #define sqlite3_busy_timeout           sqlite3_api->busy_timeout
00227 #define sqlite3_changes                sqlite3_api->changes
00228 #define sqlite3_close                  sqlite3_api->close
00229 #define sqlite3_collation_needed       sqlite3_api->collation_needed
00230 #define sqlite3_collation_needed16     sqlite3_api->collation_needed16
